result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ لۡيَقۡضُواْ تَفَثَهُمۡ وَلۡيُوفُواْ نُذُورَهُمۡ وَلۡيَطَّوَّفُواْ بِٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ
result.translation: Hanyuma abagiye gushengerera nya ngoro, baheze batunganye iyindi migirwa yo gushengerera ingoro ntagatifu, ijanye no kwiyuhagira, uguca inzara no kumwa umushatsi, baheze kandi bubahirize ishirwa mu ngiro ry’ivyo biyemeje gukora bijanye n’ishengerera n’igendera ry’ingoro ntagatifu, harimwo no kubaga, bongere bakikure inyubakwa ya kera ya Al-Ka’ba, ikingiwe;
